Package DAO

Class AppointmentQueries

java.lang.Object
DAO.AppointmentQueries
public class AppointmentQueries extends Object
Data access class that holds all database query methods pertaining to the Appointment class.

  • Method Details

    • insertAppointment

      public static int insertAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, ZonedDateTime start, ZonedDateTime end, String createdBy, String lastUpdatedBy, int custId, int userId, int contId)
      Method that takes appointment information and inserts into appointments table in database.
      Parameters:
      title - Appointment title String used in INSERT INTO query.
      description - Appointment description String used in INSERT INTO query.
      location - Appointment location String used in INSERT INTO query.
      type - Appointment type String used in INSERT INTO query.
      start - Appointment start ZonedDateTime object converted to String used in INSERT INTO query.
      end - Appointment end ZonedDateTime object converted to String used in INSERT INTO query.
      createdBy - User who is creating appointment, as a String, used in INSERT INTO query.
      lastUpdatedBy - User who is creating appointment, as a String, used in INSERT INTO query.
      custId - Appointment's corresponding customer ID, as an int, used in INSERT INTO query.
      userId - Appointment's corresponding user ID, as an int, used in INSERT INTO query.
      contId - Appointment's corresponding contact ID, as an int, used in INSERT INTO query.
      Returns:
      Returns 1 if query is successful, otherwise returns 0.

    • selectAllAppointments

      public static ResultSet selectAllAppointments() throws SQLException
      Method that queries the database to select all from the appointments table.
      Returns:
      Returns the ResultSet from selecting all appointments query.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • selectAppointmentByTable

      public static ResultSet selectAppointmentByTable(String title, String description, ZonedDateTime start) throws SQLException
      Method that queries the database to select appointment by title, description, and start DateTime.
      Parameters:
      title - Appointment title String used in SELECT query.
      description - Appointment description String used in SELECT query.
      start - Appointment start ZonedDateTime object converted to string in SELECT query.
      Returns:
      Returns the ResultSet from selecting given appointment query.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • selectAppointmentByTable

      public static ResultSet selectAppointmentByTable(int id, int tableNum) throws SQLException
      Method the queries the database to select appointment by ID and a particular table via a tableNum int.
      Parameters:
      id - Appointment ID int used in SELECT query.
      tableNum - The desired appointment table from which to query. Table 1 is "All," table 2 is "Current Month," and table 3 is "Current Week."
      Returns:
      Returns the ResultSet from selecting given appointment query.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • selectCurrMonthAppointments

      public static ResultSet selectCurrMonthAppointments() throws SQLException
      Method that queries the database to select all appointments for the current month from the appointments table.
      Returns:
      Returns the ResultSet from selecting appointments query for the current month.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • selectCurrWeekAppointments

      public static ResultSet selectCurrWeekAppointments() throws SQLException
      Method that queries the database to select all appointments for the current week from the appointments table.
      Returns:
      Returns the ResultSet from selecting appointments query for the current week.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • deleteAppointment

      public static int deleteAppointment(int id) throws SQLException
      Method that queries the database to delete an appointment with a given ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - Appointment ID int used in DELETE FROM query.
      Returns:
      Returns the ResultSet from executing delete query for particular appointment.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • updateAppointment

      public static int updateAppointment(int apptId, String title, String description, String location, String type, ZonedDateTime start, ZonedDateTime end, String lastUpdatedBy, int custId, int userId, int contId) throws SQLException
      Method that updates a given appointment from database's appointment table.
      Parameters:
      apptId - Appointment ID used to identify appointment data to be queried.
      title - Appointment title String used in UPDATE query.
      description - Appointment description String used in UPDATE query.
      location - Appointment location String used in UPDATE query.
      type - Appointment type String used in UPDATE query.
      start - Appointment start ZonedDateTime object converted to String used in UPDATE query.
      end - Appointment end ZonedDateTime object converted to String used in UPDATE query.
      lastUpdatedBy - User who is updating appointment, as a String, used in UPDATE query.
      custId - Appointment's corresponding customer ID, as an int, used in UPDATE query.
      userId - Appointment's corresponding user ID, as an int, used in UPDATE query.
      contId - Appointment's corresponding contact ID, as an int, used in UPDATE query.
      Returns:
      Returns 1 if query is successful, otherwise returns 0.
      Throws:
      SQLException
